author: Reuters
title: Starbucks brings Beyond Meat, oat milk to China with new plant-based lunch menu
description: The new lunch menu will feature pastas and lasagna made with Beyond Meat's plant-based alternative beef products
content:
Starbucks Corp. said on Monday it would roll out a plant-based food and beverage menu in China this week, launching Beyond Meat Inc. and Oatly products in a country which is trying to recover from coronavirus shutdowns.
The world’s biggest coffee chain has r… [+2340 chars]
